Posts.EditableText: IF-er verityvirtue has announced an ongoing jam for games inspired by Terry Pratchett's Discworld, running from now until 28 July: https://itch.io/jam/discworld-open-jam
Posts.HTML:
IF-er verityvirtue has announced an ongoing jam for games inspired by Terry Pratchett's Discworld, running from now until 28 July:

https://itch.io/jam/discworld-open-jam
